column4: I have a fat32 WD My Book, named as "My Book".  It causes all kinds of problems due to the space and I either want to know how to change it, or if there is a secret to working with spaces in filenames.  Formating is out of the question unless you have a spare 500 gigs for me to use as backup.  I just want to change the name.  I noticed in mtab, it is reffered to as follows: " /dev/sdb1 /media/My\040Book"  Can I change the na
me somehow without formatting the drive?
the use of "!..." anything has gotten ridiculous around here
it's to call on the bot ;)
